short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep you tab bar tidy with auto grouping without need to group them manually.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Group tabs automatically based on URL.

[6.0.0]
- optimize tabs (closed previous tabs with same domain)
- new user interface (dak/light)
- add delay option
[5.1.0]
- enable/disable grouping
- custom tabgroup names, colors on popup
[5.0.0] added features, customizations , fixes & improvements
[4.0.0] fixed restore tabs, improvements
